title: Ken Burns | “Tell These Stories, As Difficult As They May Be”
description:
Peabody Award-winning director Ken Burns stops by to offer a preview of the incredibly difficult subject matter he tackles in his latest documentary, "The U.S. and the Holocaust," which is available now on PBS.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
